backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining card, user, and history types with access control, storage mixins, and functions for managing cards and change history.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor state and a basic migration function copying data and adding a new backfillMarker map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific history-page UI update to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their functionality across pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style definitions using OKLCH variables for light and dark theme color systems.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component handling authentication, actor initialization, timeouts, error states, and the main tabbed layout.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: Dialog component for creating new cards with validation, autocomplete suggestions, and integration with the addCard mutation.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Provides a text input with filtered autocomplete suggestions and outside-click handling.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Renders a collectible card with rarity styling, pricing details, and actions for editing, selling, or deleting.
frontend/src/components/CraftedCardsModa: Displays crafted cards in a modal with rarity badges, purchase info, and metadata.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Modal form for editing a card’s fields, handling price, metadata, and date conversion.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches and displays errors with technical details and a reload option.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with a credit link and visual styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with authentication controls and user profile display using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name on first setup.
frontend/src/components/SellOrTradeDialo: Dialog component for selling or trading a card, including forms, state handling, and mutation calls to update backend data.
frontend/src/components/SoldCardsModal.t: Modal showing transaction history with tabs for sales and trades, calculating purchase/sale values and listing card details.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines centralized React Query keys for user‑scoped data such as cards, profiles, transactions, and snapshots.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on user identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Provides access to React Query state for the actor initialization query, exposing status flags and a retry helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for Google authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, including identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, change history, and card operations.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS base and theme layer defining light and dark mode color variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point configuring React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Card list page with extensive filtering, search, and add-card dialog functionality.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Activity history page that loads change events, maps card IDs to names, and triggers backfill if empty.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Portfolio summary page computing investment metrics, profits, and modal-driven transaction details.
frontend/src/utils/cardSuggestions.ts: Utility for extracting unique card field values and filtering suggestion lists.
frontend/src/utils/formatTimestamp.ts: Functions to format bigint timestamps into readable or relative time strings.
frontend/src/utils/redactSecrets.ts: Utilities that redact sensitive values from text and errors to prevent secret leakage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including history-related feature requests, architectural notes, known issues, and metadata for the Sorare Portfolio project.
